title: Verisure
summary: Access your connected and protected home with the Verisure app.
description: This app works with all Verisure systems in Sweden, Norway, Finland, Denmark, Belgium, Netherlands, France (only VBox systems) and UK. If you have a FAST system, use this app instead: My VerisureWith the Verisure app you can control and monitor your connected and protected home with your phone and your Android Wear/Apple Watch. Arm and disarm the alarm. Get notifications when your children come home and check the alarm status.Read off the temperature and relative humidity through several of our products, to make sure that the climate conditions in your home are optimal.Verisure Smart - make your home smarter and safer. Control your favourite devices and services when you need them. Reminders - remember what you don't. By setting up reminders you get notified if you for example have forgotten to arm or disarm.Smart buttons - perform multiple actions with one tap. For example you can switch on or off all lights connected to SmartPlugs with one tap.Verisure is a supplier of home alarms and connected services. With us you get a future-proofed system that can be extended and contains multifunctional products. By using modern technology Verisure keeps you in contact with your home and your family, wherever you are. Verisure gives you much more than a standard home alarm. You get a connected and protected home.
descriptionHTML:
This app works with all Verisure systems in Sweden, Norway, Finland, Denmark, Belgium, Netherlands, France (only VBox systems) and UK.
If you have a FAST system, use this app instead: My Verisure


With the Verisure app you can control and monitor your connected and protected home with your phone and your Android Wear/Apple Watch.

Arm and disarm the alarm. Get notifications when your children come home and check the alarm status.

Read off the temperature and relative humidity through several of our products, to make sure that the climate conditions in your home are optimal.

Verisure Smart - make your home smarter and safer. Control your favourite devices and services when you need them.

Reminders - remember what you don't. By setting up reminders you get notified if you for example have forgotten to arm or disarm.

Smart buttons - perform multiple actions with one tap. For example you can switch on or off all lights connected to SmartPlugs with one tap.

Verisure is a supplier of home alarms and connected services. With us you get a future-proofed system that can be extended and contains multifunctional products. By using modern technology Verisure keeps you in contact with your home and your family, wherever you are. Verisure gives you much more than a standard home alarm. You get a connected and protected home.
comments: Huawei Mate 8. Had difficulty first off. Once I'd set it up as per the instructions, it worked fine. Pity we can't get live pictures. But otherwise excellent app.

No windows app - No points!  Why do you not make this app for Windows 10? Over 700 million people use windows 10 now, surely that must be enough users to motivate to make an app!  Even if only a Web-app in a wrapper! I will give you proper scoring when I find your app in the Microsoft Store.
Aika hidas sovellus mutta silti toimiva olisi mukava jos sovelluksen ja widgettien teeman voisi vaihtaa tummempaan
Mega dårlig udviklet app. Virker som noget rigtigt hjemmebikset amatør app-makværk. Kan ikke anbefales til nogen.
Doesn't work on my phone anymore now that i have changed to new phone Huawei Mate 10 pro.
Appen är väldigt väldigt seg, framförallt vid uppstart.  Bildtagning tar mycket lång tid  Det borde finnas Panik/Larm knapp i appen.
